listing.title: Frontend Engineer
listing.description: At Tiktok, we believe in the power of code to change the world. As a Frontend Engineer, you'll be at the heart of that mission, developing robust, user-centric features and contributing to a codebase that is both performant and maintainable. Come help us build something great!
listing.insights: Known for its flat organizational structure and high levels of autonomy.
requirements: Mentorship experience, providing constructive feedback and code reviews
5+ years of experience in a senior engineering role
Strong proficiency in at least one modern programming language (Python, Java, C++, Go, etc.)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
Deep understanding of React, Vue, or Angular for redundant frontend architectures
Solid understanding of relational (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases

events.notes: Applied via company career portal.
Focused on my experience with distributed systems and remote collaboration.
Technical deep dive into React and system design.

listing.title: Backend Software Engineer
listing.description: Tiktok is on a journey to scale its core platform, and we need a talented Backend Software Engineer to lead the way. You'll contribute to high-visibility projects, work with a brilliant team of peers, and help us maintain our reputation for technical excellence and rapid innovation.
listing.insights: Strong focus on product-led growth and engineering excellence.
requirements: Contributions to open-source projects or a strong technical portfolio
Experience with real-time data processing (Kafka, Spark, Flink)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
Experience building and scaling high-traffic microservices using Node.js or Go
Ability to work effectively in a remote-first or hybrid team culture

events.notes: In-mail request from a recruiter specializing in scaling startups.
Talked through my background and why I'm interested in this specific mission.
Met with the team lead to discuss backend architecture.

listing.title: Full Stack Developer
listing.description: At Horizon Labs, we believe in the power of code to change the world. As a Full Stack Developer, you'll be at the heart of that mission, developing robust, user-centric features and contributing to a codebase that is both performant and maintainable. Come help us build something great!
listing.insights: Recruiter mentioned they are looking for someone who can start soon.
requirements: Ability to work effectively in a remote-first or hybrid team culture
Understanding of secure coding practices and web security fundamentals
Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies and Jira/Confluence
Solid understanding of relational (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases
Expertise in cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and infrastructure as code (Terraform)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
3+ years of professional software development experience
5+ years of experience in a senior engineering role

events.notes: Initial interest triggered by a blog post about their architecture.
Team fit interview; met the potential peers and discussed their daily workflow.
Round 1: Technical deep dive into React architecture and state management.
Received an offer! Negotiating terms.

listing.title: Frontend Developer
listing.description: At Horizon Labs, we believe in the power of code to change the world. requirements: 3+ years of professional software development experience

Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
5+ years of experience in a senior engineering role

events.notes: In-mail request from a recruiter specializing in scaling startups.
Team fit interview; met the potential peers and discussed their daily workflow.
Final behavioral round with the CTO; discussed long-term product vision.
They decided to go with another candidate.

listing.title: Software Engineer
listing.description: Are you a passionate Software Engineer? Join Optiver to work on mission-critical systems that reach millions of users daily. We prioritize clean code, scalable architecture, and a healthy engineering culture where every voice is heard and every contribution matters.
listing.insights: Well-established industry leader with clear career progression paths.
requirements: Excellent communication and collaboration skills in a cross-functional environment
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks
Experience with GraphQL or RESTful API design and implementation
Deep understanding of React, Vue, or Angular for redundant frontend architectures
3+ years of professional software development experience
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field

events.notes: Met recruiter at a local tech meetup, they encouraged me to apply.
Hiring manager cited a need for more senior leadership experience.

listing.title: Frontend Developer
